version_description: This week we were optimizing hiking trails presentation. They are more efficient now, faster, and consume less battery. We are getting ready for hiking trails navigation. Please let us know what you think about the app and leave us a review. We are eager
Hiking trails navigation is available now. Please double tap on the compass and try the navigation. It is amazing!
Performance improvements.
Bug fix for pre-iPhone 5s devices.

Plan your hiking adventures with the brand new PeakVisor Teleport feature. Choose any location in the world and travel there in an instant. Explore peaks, mountain huts, hiking trails before hitting the road. Please try this feature and let us know what d

In this version we added parking lots and viewpoints into 3D maps. That’s extremely important for planning hikes and area research. In the end having amazing views and convenient parking place is crucial for any successful hike.
One more thing. The 3D
This is an intermediate release with performance improvements and bug fixes. We hear your feedback and want to hear more. Please let us know at peakvisor@routes.tips.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Performance improvements and bug fixes.
Rendering in 3D Explore mode fixed.

The newest version of the app has a lot of under the hood improvements. You should notice significantly smoother 3D camera movements, much more pleasant and convenient labels in 3D map. But probably the most important thing is that we optimized alorithms,

Everything your autumn adventure might need was packed into this new release:
* significant performance improvements (faster and less battery drain)
* less memory consumption
* more convenient 3D navigation mode (precise real-time compass directi
The photo import feature has been fixed

[Visibility Range] With temperatures declining in many parts of the world visibility distance is dramatically increasing and revealing faraway mountain ranges. Peaks which were hidden due to the haze and clouds make a distinct skyline now. So far, PeakVis
Fix for the missing silhouettes.

It might be hard to get out into the mountains due to severe weather conditions but it is so pleasing to plan your next outdoor adventures with a fancy new transition from 360 mountain panorama to 3D maps and vice versa. Also, in this version the current
Fix for the photo mode.
Now you can import your photo directly from the Photos app.
Small bug fixes.

In this version we significantly improved hiking trails rendering. They are nicer and more informative. Try to route a trail in the 3D maps mode and then see it in your camera view (Augmented Reality). This way you could visualise any adventure. For more
3D mode rendering enhancements.

With winter settling in the northern hemisphere PeakVisor Winter Mode is just around the corner. It is almost like a race between 2019 and the winter mode. What comes first?! But in this release we brought a lot of other important improvements:
* 3D ma

In this version we've added most of the ski runs all over the world, mountain lifts, and significantly improved quality of the Augmented Reality mode by using ARKit. Please let us know about your experience with the new version. We're always ready to resp
The onboarding demo was restored and several nasty crashes fixed.

For a long while, PeakVisor has been a definitive tool to identify mountains and get detailed information about the peaks. The summer 2018 PeakVisor got state-of-the-art 3D maps with hiking trails and routing capabilities. Now, in winter 2019 when most of

With snowfalls all over the world, we've been focused on polishing PeakVisor Winter Mode and 3D maps. Here's the list of this week improvements:
* Numerous visual issues fixed, Winter Mode features were polished.
* Added more real-time live statuses

3D Maps are better than ever before: explore all the funiculars, narrow gauges, cable cars around you with detailed info about them. And you can now enter 3D by a convenient button in the right corner.
Bug fix for infinite 'Decompressing resources' status.
Minor improvements and fixes.
3D maps usability and controls improvements. More convenient ski runs selection on tap, true north indication in 3D maps.
3D Map fixes for iPhone 6s and some iPads.

Riding a funicular, a car, a train or even an airplane? With the latest optimisations you will be able to experience the augmented reality in a much smoother way.
And we also added Russian and Latin American Spanish localisations.
Crash fix.

Satellite in 3D maps is now available, and for a limited time, you can experience this new, exciting feature for free! In the future, the Satellite option and other select features will be available with a Premium Subscription. However, in the meantime, w
Satellite 3D Maps performance improvements and polishing. More maps, more details. It is the time to go out and have some fun!

Effective today the PeakVisor app becomes free. No need to spend a lot of time researching whether the app is a good fit for your outdoor adventures. Everyone can download the app and use it without paying anything. We appreciate all app supporters who bo

Effective today the PeakVisor app becomes free. No need to spend a lot of time researching whether the app is a good fit for your outdoor adventures. Everyone can download the app and use it without paying anything. We appreciate all app supporters who bo
Optimised new users onboarding, also the restore purchase procedure for those who bought the app in the past is now smoother and faster.
The new version doesn't waste iCloud storage. Minor performance optimisations.
Fixed bugs with Accessibility. Build size optimisations.
Minor bug fixes
iCloud backup logic updated. Improved localisation quality and performance tuning.
Minor bug fixes and usability improvements.

It is time to learn new moves! Did you know that you can double tap on the compass to open amazing 3D maps and explore the area with a bird’s-eye view. We’ve added a small reminder to the compass to let you know about this wonderful feature. So, why not t

離線路徑規劃功能更加智能化。距離與地形剖面之外，我們還在其中增添了遠足路徑不同區段的難度級別。

我們最近收到反饋，有部分用戶表示，應用里的預估時間不太準（或者相當不準）。因此，我們決定藉助最新科學成果來解決這一問題。目前已經有許多先進的計算公式與技巧來提供更準確的預估時間。不過，這到頭來還是取決於氣候條件與個人水平，因為——讓我們面對現實——有些人在踩著滑溜溜的岩石行走時，可能就是比其他人快一些。我們在此次更新中向著更為精確的預測前進了一步，而且將來還會推出更多更新的功能。與此同時，我們非常

離線路徑規劃功能更加智能化。距離與地形剖面之外，我們還在其中增添了遠足路徑不同區段的難度級別。

我們最近收到反饋，有部分用戶表示，應用里的預估時間不太準（或者相當不準）。因此，我們決定藉助最新科學成果來解決這一問題。目前已經有許多先進的計算公式與技巧來提供更準確的預估時間。不過，這到頭來還是取決於氣候條件與個人水平，因為——讓我們面對現實——有些人在踩著滑溜溜的岩石行走時，可能就是比其他人快一些。我們在此次更新中向著更為精確的預測前進了一步，而且將來還會推出更多更新的功能。與此同時，我們非常

Exceptional PeakVisor 3D Maps are even better now! Higher precision landscape model and WAY farther rendering are at your disposal. Now, you can switch between satellite and topographic styles right on the 3D Maps screen (no need to change it from the set
We are introducing a neural-network-based algorithm, to perfectly align mountain silhouettes even when the compass readings are not reliable. Enjoy!

Peaks Identification on steroids. Now using Computer Vision.
Here we bring minor improvements, fine-tuning and some iOS 13 related bug fixes.

Spectacular (and very efficient) 3D maps for any adventure. Be that climbing in the Rockies, trekking in the Himalayas, or hiking in the Alps.
We heard that many of you enjoy the gorgeous iOS 13 Dark Mode, so in this release we improved how the app loo

Spectacular 3D Maps and Peaks Identification are essentials for any outdoor adventure.
In this version we improved 3D maps and got them ready for the peaks database update. There will be more mountains in the app soon. We dug into very old paper maps t

Be a superhero of outdoors navigation with state-of-the-art 3D maps and mountain identification in the palm of your hand!
This time we’ve fixed several pesky bugs, including the one which broke the photo import feature.

PeakVisor will make you a superhero of outdoors navigation by putting state-of-the-art 3D maps and mountain identification in the palm of your hand.

Now PeakVisor knows even more peaks. We have spent a lot of time researching mountainous regions fr

任何登山冒險都不可或缺的必備應用程式。覆蓋全球的精彩3D地圖和山峰識別功能。現已進入冬季模式。

For the next several powder months we enable the Winter Mode by default. That means that the app will download wintertime satellite imagery, so you can see snowy peaks in all their splendor. The new a

PeakVisor冬季模式。為每位翻山越嶺者貼心打造雪山山峰識別功能和3D地圖。PeakVisor應用程式，賦予你非凡的戶外技能。

This update brings town and glacier labels in 3D Maps. Now you can see what village is down there and what glaciers are nearby. For example, Mount Rainier has 48 glaciers on its slop

PeakVisor冬季模式。為每位翻山越嶺者貼心打造雪山山峰識別功能和3D地圖。PeakVisor應用程式，賦予你非凡的戶外技能。

This update brings town and glacier labels in 3D Maps. Now you can see what village is down there and what glaciers are nearby. For example, Mount Rainier has 48 glaciers on its slop
冬季特供。PeakVisor精彩3D地圖，為您提供所有主要滑雪勝地的登山纜車詳細時間表。

The best 3D Maps and Mountain Identification technology. Now with smart routing capabilities for winter enthusiasts. Find your mountain lift and ski run.
In this release we added an option to find a way to a ski run through open mountain lifts. Whateve

最好的3D地圖和山峰識別技術。現已為各位跋山涉雪者搭配智慧路線規劃功能。輕鬆找到登山纜車和滑雪道。

In this release we optimised the main menu and added an option to find a way to a ski run through the open mountain lifts. Whatever the complexity of a ski resort is, PeakVisor will help you to fin

最好的3D地圖和山峰識別技術。現已為各位跋山涉雪者搭配智慧路線規劃功能。輕鬆找到登山纜車和滑雪道。

Ski Tracking allows you to track your snow sport activities. See your tracks in 3D maps and analyze skiing stats using the latest version of the PeakVisor app.

最好的3D地圖和山峰識別技術。現已為各位跋山涉雪者搭配智慧路線規劃功能。輕鬆找到登山纜車和滑雪道。

Ski Tracking allows you to track your snow sport activities. See your tracks in 3D maps and analyze skiing stats using the latest version of the PeakVisor app. But this time it really does work.

最好的3D地圖和山峰識別技術。現已為各位跋山涉雪者搭配智慧路線規劃功能。輕鬆找到登山纜車和滑雪道。

Ski Tracking allows you to track your snow sport activities. See your tracks in 3D maps and analyze skiing stats using the latest version of the PeakVisor app. This time with 3D Maps improvements.
PeakVisor is a superior mountain identification and 3D maps app. This time we bring lakes, mountain passes, and custom waypoints into the mix. Find the best route in the mountains.

探索PeakVisor小工具！在你的主畫面上獲取有用、有趣的山峰資料。

加入我們的全球山峰收集挑戰賽。打卡山峰、山口、山間小屋和湖泊；及時更新你的旅行日誌，無論身處何地，都能解锁成就。

This time we added interactivity to the Travel Logbook screen and the capability to add a profile photo.

山峰收集成就等你來解鎖。使用「旅行日誌」功能在各地簽到，如山峰、山口、山間小屋、湖泊，讓我們看看你能解鎖多少成就。

In this version, we improved the GPS tracking feature. Now you can trim your recorded tracks. It is very useful if you forgot to turn off the tracking at the end of the trail (like we do all
我們的首要任務之一，是為用戶提供有關世界各地山峰的最詳細的資訊。鑒於一張照片勝過千言萬語的道理，我們特此實現了一個功能，讓你可以上傳自己拍攝的山峰、山口、山間小屋和湖泊的照片。你的照片將幫助其他探險者探索你去過的地方！
我們的首要任務之一，是為用戶提供有關世界各地山峰的最詳細的資訊。鑒於一張照片勝過千言萬語的道理，我們特此實現了一個功能，讓你可以上傳自己拍攝的山峰、山口、山間小屋和湖泊的照片。你的照片將幫助其他探險者探索你去過的地方！

Meet stunning fly-through videos in PeakVisor 3D Maps! Tap the airplane button of any object on the map and start flying. By the way, you can fly-through any trail as well.

3D地圖是PeakVisor應用程式中最重要的功能。每一天，我們都在思考如何讓它變得更好、更快、更實用、提供更多有用的資訊。今天，我們很高興地為你帶來

過去的一年是艱難的一年，但我們馬上就要迎來新的篇章。近期我們對應用做出了許多驚人的改進，我們希望你會喜歡這些新增加的工具。現在，PeakVisor可以為你展示壯麗秀美的鳥瞰影片（支持離線使用），提供替代路徑，顯示月球軌道——幫助你規劃一場美妙的月光漫步，還有許許多多的其他功能。

我們迫不及待地想要為你帶來2021年產品計畫中的所有改進內容，來年一定會是充滿新奇發現的美好的一年。

有一種猜測認為，人們在山上拍攝的照片比其他任何地方加起來的都多。為了使戶外攝影邁上新的臺階，我們在應

有一種猜測認為，人們在山上拍攝的照片比其他任何地方加起來的都多。為了使戶外攝影邁上新的臺階，我們在應用內增加了日出與日落時間；搭配PeakVisor的路

近期我們對應用做出了許多驚人的改進，我們希望你會喜歡這些新增加的工具。現在，PeakVisor可以為你展示壯麗秀美的鳥瞰影片（支持離線使用），提供替代路徑，顯示月球軌道——幫助你規劃一場美妙的月光漫步，還有許許多多的其他功能。

我們迫不及待地想要為你帶來2021年產品計畫中的所有改進內容，來年一定會是充滿新奇發現的美好的一年。

有一種猜測認為，人們在山上拍攝的照片比其他任何地方加起來的都多。為了使戶外攝影邁上新的臺階，我們在應用內增加了日出與日落時間；搭配PeakVisor的路徑規劃功能，讓你可以在正確的時間到達完美的拍照地點。另外，別忘了與我們分享你拍攝的 #peakvisor 照片喔
有一種猜測認為，人們在山上拍攝的照片比其他任何地方加起來的都多。為了使戶外攝影邁上新的臺階，我們在應用內增加了日出與日落時間；搭配PeakVisor的路徑規劃功能，讓你可以在正確的時間到達完美的拍照地點。另外，別忘了與我們分享你拍攝的 #peakvisor 照片喔
